thread.title: On Working With Single, High-Income Women

author: wsjcom
title: On Working With Single, High-Income Women
text:
Nancy Coutu • Co-founder of Money Managers Financial Group, Oak Brook, Ill. • Education: BS Loyola University Chicago - Mundelein College • Professional designations: Certified Financial Planner, Chartered Life Underwriter, Chartered Financial Consultant.
Background: Before becoming an adviser, Ms. Coutu had a career in payroll-services sales. She says the process of explaining enrollment in 401(k) retirement plans helped inspire her move to financial planning. “Then, as now, many people didn’t know how to plan for their...
